<<<<<<< HEAD
A treatise of libertie from Iudaisme, or An acknowledgement of true Christian libertie, indited and published by Iohn Traske: of late stumbling, now happily running againe in the race of Christianitie Traske, John, d. ca. 1638.
[10], 42, [2] p.
Printed by W. Stansby, for N. Butter, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the pyde Bull, neere S. Austens gate, London : 1620.
Running title reads: Libertie, from Iudaisme. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

Printed by W. Stansby, for N. Butter, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the pyde Bull, neere S. Austens gate, London : 1620.
